formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw:
Gradient: Given by the vector of partial derivatives: \( 
abla f =  rac{\partial f}{\partial x} \hat{i} +  rac{\partial f}{\partial y} \hat{j} +  rac{\partial f}{\partial z} \hat{k} \) Divergence: \( 
abla \cdot F =  rac{\partial F_1}{\partial x} +  rac{\partial F_2}{\partial y} +  rac{\partial F_3}{\partial z} \) Curl: \( 
abla 	imes F = \left(  rac{\partial F_3}{\partial y} -  rac{\partial F_2}{\partial z} ight) \hat{i} + \left(  rac{\partial F_1}{\partial z} -  rac{\partial F_3}{\partial x} ight) \hat{j} + \left(  rac{\partial F_2}{\partial x} -  rac{\partial F_1}{\partial y} ight) \hat{k} \)
